mainDescription: Welcome to the Gallente Federation, where democracy is as vast as our space fleet and freedom is as abundant as our bureaucracy. Dive into our rich culture, where every citizen is free to express their individuality—just like everyone else.

sections.title: Constitution
sections.content:
Discover the foundations of the Gallente Federation's democracy and governance in our Constitution page.

Read our Constitution

sections.title: Featured Initiatives
sections.content:
Explore our latest initiatives aimed at enhancing freedom and democracy across the galaxy. Because nothing says 'progress' like a committee-approved project.

Learn more

mainDescription: The Gallente Federation prides itself on liberty and innovation, because nothing says freedom like a few hundred regulations. Discover our history, where every decision is made by committee, ensuring that no good idea goes unpunished.

sections.title: Our Allies
sections.content:
The Gallente Federation is thrilled to be in cahoots with a motley crew of factions across the universe that allegedly share our undying love for freedom and liberty. These alliances are supposedly built on mutual respect, shared values, and a common vision for a future where democracy and individual rights are upheld—at least when it’s convenient. Whether it’s through diplomatic handshakes or the occasional back-patting, we’re all about spreading the good word of democracy, one strategic alliance at a time.

Click here to learn more

sections.title: Our Enemies
sections.content:
Ah, our enemies—those delightful folks scattered across the universe who just can’t seem to get on board with our noble quest for democracy and freedom. The Gallente Federation, ever the beacon of righteousness, often finds itself at odds with those who dare to oppose these values. Whether it’s due to ideological differences or just plain stubbornness, we’re always ready to engage in a good old-fashioned standoff with anyone who doesn’t see things our way. After all, what’s a commitment to freedom without a few adversaries to keep things interesting?

Click here to learn more.

mainDescription: Reach out to the Gallente Federation for more information or inquiries. Our customer service is as efficient as a space slug, but rest assured, your call is very important to us.

sections.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sections.content: Got questions? We've got answers. Check out our FAQ section for all the information you never knew you needed.

sections.title: Support and Services
sections.content: Learn about the support and services we offer to our citizens and allies. Our team is here to help, even if it takes a light-year or two.

mainDescription: Explore the vibrant culture of the Gallente, where art, music, and fashion are as diverse as our opinions on space taxes. Join us in celebrating the freedom to conform to our unique standards.

sections.title: Art and Entertainment
sections.content:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant art and entertainment scene of the Gallente Federation, where creativity knows no bounds—except for the ones we set.

Learn more

sections.title: Festivals and Celebrations
sections.content:
Join us in celebrating our diverse culture through festivals and events that highlight the unique spirit of the Gallente people.

Learn more

mainDescription: Discover the cutting-edge technology that powers the Gallente Federation, from starships to AI. Our tech is so advanced, it practically runs itself—except when it doesn't.

sections.title: Research and Development
sections.content:
Discover the cutting-edge research and development efforts that keep the Gallente Federation at the forefront of technological innovation.

Click here to learn more

sections.title: Future Innovations
sections.content:
Get a glimpse into the future with our upcoming technological innovations. We're always pushing the boundaries—sometimes even intentionally.

Click here to learn more
